page.title: 15HAUNTED FELBRIGG HALL?
page.content: There have been many varied stories of ghosts haunting Felbrigg Hall. An old lady was interviewed who had been a parlour maid at the Hall when she was a teenager. She particularly remembered two strange events. When she passed an upstairs door, her candle often went out. Also, when she opened a particular door, she could hear a voice saying "Come in", but there was no-one there. These may not seem very strange, but the same thing happened to another maid. The maids were not scared by any of these events, but assumed that it was the ghost of a lady who had occupied the rooms previously. There does not, however, appear to be any recorded sighting of a lady or any other ghost in Felbrigg Hall.
